Samuddadatta：1．Samuddadatta． A monk whom Devadatta persuaded to join him in trying to bring about schism in the Order （Vin．ii．196； iii．171）．

He was a favourite of Thullanandā．Vin．iv．66．

2．Samuddadatta． A king who traced his descent fromMahāsammata．He was the first of a dynasty of twenty five kings who ruled in Rājagaha．MT．129．
